title: With margins back to pre-covid level, Hero MotoCorp targets enhanced market share, business growth
description: Hero MotoCorp looks to enhance market share, production capacity, and electric vehicle range. 25,000 bookings for Harley-Davidson X440.

title: Hero MotoCorp targets bigger market share
description: With its margins back to pre-Covid levels, Hero MotoCorp is now looking at sustainable growth, enhancing market share across segments on the back of new product launches over the next few quarters, according to a top company executive.

title: Hero MotoCorp unveils refreshed Glamour motorbike
description: Hero MotoCorp launches new Glamour motorcycle in India, with prices starting at ₹82,348. Ranjivjit Singh, Chief Business Officer, India BU, is confident the new Glamour will strengthen the brand’s presence in the competitive 125cc segment and grow appeal of two-wheeler portfolio.
